name: Space Journey 2 | 2D Platformer
description:
This is my 2D Platformer I made while completing Game Design and Development 2: 2D Platofrmer.

You can use W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move and Space button to jump. 

Modifications:

1) Changed level 1 so it becomes a bit more challenging.

2) Created 2 more unique levels with the abilities to explore levels or complete them a faster.

Hope you enjoy this game and have fun :)
